name: ButtonTheme
info: Mainly used to set default properties for descendant Button-type components uniformly, and also to obtain the default properties of a Button through this component.

nodes.name: ButtonTheme Usage
desc: The property parameters are the same as MaterialButton. You can obtain button theme data through ButtonTheme.of, "
and also set default styles for button components that are descendants of ButtonTheme, including color, shape, size, etc.
